name: Blaine's Moltres
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, shuffle Blaine's Moltres and all cards attached to it into your deck (after doing damage).

name: Brock's Rhydon
AbilityText: As long as Brock's Rhydon is Benched, whenever 1 of your Benched Pokemon is damaged, you may do 10 of that damage to Brock's Rhydon instead. (If more than 1 of your Benched Pokemon is damaged at the same time, you may use this power once for each of them.)
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Erika's Clefable
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, you may return any number of your Pokemon in play and all cards attached to them to your hand.

name: Erika's Dragonair
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Shuffle Erika's Dragonair and all cards attached to it into your deck. Then, your opponent shuffles his or her Active Pokemon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck.

name: Erika's Vileplume
AbilityText: If an attack does damage to Erika's Vileplume while it's your Active Pokemon (even if it's Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused. This power works even while Erika's Vileplume is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: If Erika's Vileplume does damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), remove a number of damage counters from Erika's Vileplume equal to half the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (rounded up to the nearest 10). If Erika's Vileplume has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

name: Lt. Surge's Electabuzz
Attack1Text: Take up to 2 Lightning Energy cards from your discard pile and attach them to Lt. Surge's Electabuzz.
Attack2Text: Discard all Lightning Energy cards attached to Lt. Surge's Electabuzz in order to use this attack. Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Lightning Energy cards you discarded. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lt. Surge's Fearow
Attack1Text: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Lt. Surge's Magneton
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), if Lt. Surge's Magneton is your Active Pokemon, you may take 1 Lightning Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon and attach it to Lt. Surge's Magneton. This power can't be used if Lt. Surge's Magneton is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Lt. Surge's Magneton does 20 damage to itself.

name: Misty's Seadra
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 60 more damage. If 1 or both of them are tails, this attack does 30 damage.

name: Misty's Tentacruel
AbilityText: If an attack does damage to Misty's Tentacruel while it's your Active Pokemon, you may switch it with 1 of your Benched Pokemon, which prevents all other effects of that attack on Misty's Tentacruel. This power can't be used if Misty's Tentacruel is already Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Rocket's Hitmonchan
Attack1Text: If an attack does damage to Rocket's Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn (even if Rocket's Hitmonchan is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, Rocket's Hitmonchan attacks your opponent's Active Pokemon for double that amount of damage. (If Rocket's Hitmonchan takes 20 damage, it does 40 damage to that Pokemon.)

name: Rocket's Moltres
AbilityText: When Rocket's Moltres is Knocked Out, you may return it to your hand after discarding it. This power can't be used if Rocket's Moltres is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when it is Knocked Out.
Attack1Text: If an attack does damage to Rocket's Moltres during your opponent's next turn (even if Rocket's Moltres is Knocked Out), Rocket's Moltres attacks your opponent's Active Pokemon for 10 damage. (Apply Weakness and Resistance.)

name: Rocket's Scyther
Attack1Text: Whenever Rocket's Scyther is attacked, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does no damage to Rocket's Scyther. (Any other effects of the attack still happen.) This effect lasts until Rocket's Scyther takes damage (or is Benched or is evolved).

name: Sabrina's Gengar
Attack1Text: Put a damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon has already has any damage counters on it.
Attack2Text: Unless this attack Knocks Out the Defending Pokemon, flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent shuffles his or her Active Pokemon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck.

name: Brock's Golem
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose up to 3 of them. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Brock's Onix
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose up to 2 of them. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Brock's Onix can't attack during your next turn.

name: Brock's Rhyhorn
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Brock's Rhyhorn does 10 damage to itself.

name: Brock's Sandslash
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Brock's Zubat
Attack1Text: Draw a card. Then, switch Brock's Zubat with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. You can't use this attack if your Bench is empty.

name: Erika's Clefairy
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card. Show that card to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Erika's Victreebel
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, and if your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with his or her Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Erika's Victreebel is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

name: Lt. Surge's Electabuzz
Attack1Text: Take up to 2 Lightning Energy cards from your discard pile and attach them to Lt. Surge's Electabuzz.
Attack2Text: Take 1 Lightning Energy card attached to Lt. Surge's Electabuzz and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you have no Benched Pokemon, discard that Energy card.

name: Lt. Surge's Raichu
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Lt. Surge's Raichu in order to use this attack.

name: Misty's Cloyster
AbilityText: You may reduce all damage done by attacks to Misty's Cloyster by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (Any other effects of attacks still happen). This power can't be used if Misty's Cloyster is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Misty's Goldeen
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Misty's Poliwrath
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each Pokemon that isn't Water on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Misty's Tentacool
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Search your deck for any number of Pokemon named Tentacool, Tentacruel, Misty's Tentacool, and/or Misty's Tentacruel. Show those cards to your opponent, then put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Rocket's Snorlax
AbilityText: If your opponent's attack does damage to Rocket's Snorlax and Rocket's Snorlax is already Asleep (even if it's Knocked Out), this power does 20 damage to the attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Rocket's Snorlax is now Asleep (after doing damage).

name: Sabrina's Venomoth
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon. If a Pokemon has fewer damage counters than the number of heads, remove all of them.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If 1 or both of them are heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Blaine's Growlithe
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Blaine's Growlithe does 10 damage to itself.

name: Blaine's Kangaskhan
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage.

name: Blaine's Magmar
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.
Attack2Text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. (If there are fewer than 5 cards in your deck, discard all of them.) This attack does 20 damage for each Fire Energy card you discarded in this way.

name: Brock's Geodude
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokemon.

name: Brock's Golbat
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

name: Brock's Graveler
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Brock's Lickitung
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Erika's Dratini
AbilityText: Whenever an attack by a Basic Pokemon (including your own) does 20 or more damage to Erika's Dratini (after applying Weakness and Resistance), reduce that damage to 10. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.) This power stops working while Erika's Dratini is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

name: Erika's Exeggcute
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, whenever Erika's Exeggcute takes damage, divide that damage in half (rounded down to the nearest 10). (Any other effects still happen.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing to the Defending Pokemon and Erika's Exeggcute does 20 damage to itself.

name: Erika's Exeggutor
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 5 cards.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage.

name: Erika's Gloom
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 4 damage counters from Erika's Gloom. If Erika's Gloom has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned (your choice).

name: Erika's Gloom
Attack1Text: Both the Defending Pokemon and Erika's Gloom are now Asleep (after doing damage).
Attack2Text: Both the Defending Pokemon and Erika's Gloom are now Confused (after doing damage).

name: Erika's Oddish
AbilityText: All Energy cards attached to Erika's Oddish provide Grass Energy instead of their usual type. This power works even while Erika's Oddish is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Erika's Weepinbell
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with his or her Active Pokemon. This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokemon.

name: Erika's Weepinbell
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

name: Lt. Surge's Magnemite
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Energy cards and discard it.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Lt. Surge's Raticate
Attack1Text: Does damage to the Defending Pokemon equal to half the Defending Pokemon's remaining HP (rounded up to the nearest 10).

name: Misty's Poliwhirl
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Energy cards and discard it.
Attack2Text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Water Energy attached to Misty's Poliwhirl. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 damage for each heads.

name: Misty's Psyduck
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, you may search your deck for a Basic Pokemon with Misty in its name and put it onto your Bench. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Misty's Seaking
Attack2Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Misty's Starmie
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Misty's Starmie but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Misty's Tentacool
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't attach Energy cards to the Defending Pokemon during his or her next turn.

name: Sabrina's Haunter
Attack1Text: Flip a number of coins equal to the total number of Sabrina's Gastlys, Sabrina's Haunters, and Sabrina's Gengars you have in play. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Sabrina's Jynx
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon was Asleep, it is no longer Asleep.

name: Sabrina's Slowbro
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 3 damage counters from Sabrina's Slowbro and Sabrina's Slowbro is now Asleep. If Sabrina's Slowbro has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.
Attack2Text: You can't use this attack during your next turn.

name: Blaine's Charmander
Attack1Text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Blaine's Charmander in order to use this attack. If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Blaine's Growlithe
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each Grass Pokemon on your opponent's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Blaine's Ponyta
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Blaine's Ponyta.

name: Blaine's Tauros
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads to the Defending Pokemon and 20 damage times the number of tails to Blaine's Tauros.

name: Blaine's Vulpix
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from Blaine's Vulpix. This power can't be used if Blaine's Vulpix is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Brock's Geodude
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, you may search your deck for a Basic Pokemon card with Brock in its name and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)
Attack2Text: Don't apply Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Resistance still happen.)

name: Brock's Mankey
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokemon.

name: Brock's Mankey
Attack1Text: Shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Brock's Mankey.

name: Brock's Onix
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Brock's Rhyhorn
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If 1 or both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Brock's Sandshrew
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Brock's Sandshrew during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

name: Brock's Sandshrew
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Brock's Vulpix
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

name: Brock's Zubat
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Erika's Bellsprout
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Erika's Bellsprout
Attack1Text: Erika's Bellsprout does 10 damage to itself.

name: Erika's Exeggcute
Attack1Text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Erika's Exeggcute. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Erika's Oddish
Attack1Text: If there are any damage counters on Erika's Oddish, remove 1 of them.
Attack2Text: If Erika's Oddish has any damage counters on it, flip a coin. If heads, remove 1 of those damage counters.

name: Erika's Tangela
Attack2Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 20 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Lt. Surge's Magnemite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Lt. Surge's Pikachu
Attack1Text: Take 1 Lightning Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to Lt. Surge's Pikachu.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Lt. Surge's Rattata
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Lt. Surge's Rattata's Gnaw attack's base damage is doubled.

name: Lt. Surge's Spearow
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Lt. Surge's Voltorb
Attack1Text: Flip 1 coin. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Misty's Goldeen
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Misty's Horsea
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Misty's Poliwag
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Misty's Shellder
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, this attack does nothing (not even damage).

name: Misty's Staryu
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Pokemon Powers, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Sabrina's Abra
Attack1Text: Return a Psychic Energy card attached to Sabrina's Abra to your hand in order to use this attack.

name: Sabrina's Drowzee
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Sabrina's Gastly
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Sabrina's Mr. Mime
Attack1Text: Choose up to 3 cards from your hand and put them on top of your deck. Then search your deck for that many basic Energy cards. Show those cards to your opponent, then put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Sabrina's Slowpoke
Attack1Text: Sabrina's Slowpoke is now Asleep (after doing damage).

name: Sabrina's Venonat
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Energy cards and discard it.
